scripts.sb-children: npx concurrently "npm run storybook -- --config-dir .framework-storybooks/.storybook-preact --port 6001 --no-open"  "npm run storybook -- --config-dir .framework-storybooks/.storybook-react --port 6002 --no-open" "npm run storybook -- --config-dir .framework-storybooks/.storybook-svelte --port 6003 --no-open" "npm run storybook -- --config-dir .framework-storybooks/.storybook-vue --port 6004 --no-open"
scripts.sb-parent: npx wait-on http://localhost:6001 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6002 && npx wait-on http://localhost:6003  && npx wait-on http://localhost:6004 && npm run storybook
scripts.sb: npx concurrently "npm run sb-children" "npm run sb-parent"
